resources.title: Blue iCE Microphone
resources.long_description: Blue Snowball iCE is a stylish, entry USB mic with an attractive price tag. Unlike the similar-shaped Samson Meteorite, it is not as blatantly hot and it has a detachable USB cable with a solid Type B connector. The midrange is by far superior and technically, it produces a much more accurate sound than the former.
resources.notes: The microphone requires connection to a computer for usage

resources.title: Logitech USB Microphone
resources.long_description: The Logitech USB microphone provides superior clarity ideal for all voice access applications. Unwanted background noises are filtered by this noise-cancelling microphone to ensure interference-free conversations. It features a pivoting arm to adjust the position of the microphone and a mute button.

resources.title: Sony Professional Large Diaphragm Headphone
resources.long_description: High quality, unobtrusive, lightweight reference headphone. Engineered to be comfortable to wear for extended periods, making it ideal for use in broadcast and studio environments. Has a 9.8 foot cord terminating with a gold 3.5mm plug.
resources.notes: Uses a unimatch plug sizes 1/4-inch and 1/8-inch

resources.title: DJI Pocket 2
resources.long_description: Pocket-sized and extremely portable, DJI Pocket 2 is a tiny camera that records up to 4K and features a 3-Axis gimbal stabilizer. The gimbal keeps the camera steady, even for long-exposure shots and in low-light environments. Video can be captured up to cinematic 4K 60p video at 100 Mb/s and 64MP still photos onto a microSD card up to 256GB in capacity
resources.notes: Smartphone adapter uses lightening or USB-C
items_included: SanDisk 128GB Extreme microSDXC UHS-I Memory Card

resources.title: Smatree Portable Osmo Pocket 2 PowerStick
resources.short_description: Combo powerbank, control, and stand for the DJI Pocket 2
resources.long_description: Accessory for the DJI Pocket 2, can be used as a PowerStick and camera stand or as a PowerStick and holder for a smartphone phone and camera. Useful to gain an improved hold of the DJI Pocket 2 and extend its battery life using the rechargeable powerbank.
resources.notes: Charged via included the USB-C cable

resources.title: Canon Rebel T7 Camera
resources.short_description: DLSR Camera for video and photography
resources.long_description: Mid-range DSLR video and photography camera. Features include a large 24.1 Megapixel CMOS sensor, fast autofocus, and built-in wireless connectivity. Captures high quality HD video up to a resolution of 1080p
resources.notes: Battery can be charged while in the battery charger or inside the camera

resources.title: Canon EF-S 18-135mm Lens
resources.long_description: A good all-around lens ideal for creative photography and video. The EF-S 18-135mm f/3.5-5.6 IS USM has a versatile zoom range that is good for up-close and distant subjects and action.
resources.notes: Photo Filter Thread Size is 67 millimeters

resources.title: Canon Speedlight 600EX
resources.long_description: The Speed lite 600EX II-RT is a general purpose flash that works with Canon DSLR cameras. Flash use options include via hot shoe mount or through wireless communication.

resources.title: Canon XA40 Camcorder
resources.long_description: The Canon XA40 is a professional 4K Camcorder. The camera is compact, lightweight and features UHD 4K capture, a 1/2.3-inch CMOS sensor, two XLR audio inputs, and one mini-HDMI output. Great for video recording in different locations and lighting conditions
resources.notes: Requires training for first time use
items_included: Canon CA-570 Compact AC Power Adapter

resources.title: GoPro Hero9 Camera
resources.long_description: The HERO9 Black features a 23.6MP sensor and advanced stabilization functionality to produce high-detail video up to 5K and 20MP photos. The camera also includes many built-in professional settings and practical functions.
resources.notes: Battery can be charged while in the camera.

resources.title: Sony Omnidirectional Lavalier Microphone
resources.short_description: Microphone for interviews and on location audio capture
resources.long_description: The lavalier microphone features an omnidirectional polar pattern that picks up sound in a 360 degree radius around the mic capsule, helping to deliver consistent levels, even if the subject turns away from the capsule.

resources.title: Sony Digital Voice Recorder
resources.long_description: The Sony Digital Voice Recorder is a compact digital voice recorder offering built-in and external storage, a fast-charging internal battery, and cableless USB connectivity. Other features include an OLED display and auto-recording modes for voice and music sources.
resources.notes: Includes an slot for a microSD card

resources.title: Adobe Photoshop
resources.long_description: Professional raster graphics editor often used for photo editing, image creation and graphic design software. It uses a layer-based editing system that enables image creation and altering with multiple overlays that support transparency.
resources.notes: Available in the Library Media Room

resources.title: Audacity
resources.long_description: Audacity is a free and open-source digital audio editor and recording application software, available for Windows, macOS, and other operating systems. Features include live audio recording through a microphone or mixer. Import, edit, and combine sound files. Export your recordings in many different file formats.
resources.notes: Available in the Library Media Room

resources.title: Final Cut Pro
resources.long_description: Final Cut Pro is a video creation and editing software. It offers professional video editing capabilities. Features include video and audio clip importing, dozens of special effects, and advanced features like multicam workflow support.
resources.notes: Available in the Library Media Room

resources.title: Adobe Illustrator
resources.long_description: Supports creations of vector graphics for web images, brand logos, icons, book illustrations, product packaging, and billboards. Includes powerful editing tools and features such as support for multiple art boards and exporting to several different output formats.
resources.notes: Available in the Library Media Room

resources.title: Shure SM58 Vocal Microphone
resources.long_description: A cardioid dynamic vocal design well suited for professional vocal use in live performances, sound reinforcement, and studio recording. A built-in spherical filter minimizes wind and breath 'pop' noise, while the cardioid pickup pattern isolates the main sound source while minimizing unwanted background noise.
resources.notes: Requires XLR Cable for connection to audio interface

resources.title: Manfrotto 290 Tripod
resources.long_description: The tripod extends from 16.5-inches to a maximum height of 67.5-inches. It weighs 5.6 lb and can hold up to 22 lb of gear. The tripod's 3-section legs have flip locks to individually change the height of each leg.
